def_cn: (能引起性快感的)恋物癖，恋物
def_en: If someone has a fetish, they have an unusually strong liking or need for a particular object or activity, as a way of getting sexual pleasure.
If you say that someone has a fetish for doing something, you disapprove of the fact that they do it very often or enjoy it very much.

def_cn: 奉作神明之物，物神(尤指雕刻物)
def_en: In some cultures, a fetish is an object, especially a carved object, which is considered to have religious importance or magical powers.
